Title: Ente Mezhuthiri Athazhangal
Writer: Anoop Menon (dialogue), Anoop Menon (screenplay), Anoop Menon (story)
Actors: Anoop Menon, Mia George, Hannah Reji Koshy, Dileesh Pothan
Plot: Sanjay Paul, a chef settled in Paris who has traveled around the world wants to add Indian cuisine in his new restaurant. In his quest to get the secret recipes from his friends, he falls in love with Anjali, a custom-candle designer.
